attributes.action: Inaction over Spain/Gibraltar demonstrates, yet again, the he EU is interested only in our money and NOT our welfare WE NEED TO DUMP THEM ALL - NOW.
attributes.additional_details: How many more people than the combined population of UK and Spain AND the total membership of the EU Commission, who continue to make it clear they have no interest in us, other than our financial contribution, does it take to prove to Cameron that it really is time NOW for that referendum he promised 3 years ago, to get himself into office.
